trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for a Web Parts zone.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de design em um designer visual para uma zona de Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em um designer visual, quando você alternar de origem para o modo de Design, o código-fonte marcação que descreve o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>controle é analisado e uma versão de tempo de design do controle é criada na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando você alternar de volta à exibição da fonte, o controle de tempo de design é persistente para o código-fonte marcação e editado na marcação da página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The properties of the ToolZoneDesigner class provide the following functionality: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains all the items in a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: As propriedades da classe ToolZoneDesigner fornecem a seguinte funcionalidade: - o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ActionLists%2A>propriedade retorna um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>objeto, que geralmente contém todos os itens no painel de marcas inteligentes.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ActionLists%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A> property indicates whether the zone is displayed when the user is in browse mode.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A>propriedade indica se a zona é exibida quando o usuário está no modo de procura.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner.ViewInBrowseMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the action list collection for the zone designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de lista de ação para o designer de zona.

trans-unit.source: The ActionLists property contains a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> collection that represents the aggregation of all the items in a smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade ActionLists contém um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>coleção que representa a agregação de todos os itens no painel de marcas inteligentes.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> class contains zero or more <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> objects.
Each of these lists contains zero or more objects that represent the actual items in the panel and are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> class.
trans-unit.target: Cada uma dessas listas contém zero ou mais objetos que representam os itens reais no painel e são derivados da <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem>classe</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionItem> de

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the Web Parts zone.
trans-unit.target: Prepara o designer para exibir, editar e criar a zona de Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Web Parts zone is displayed when the user is in the browse display mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a zona de Web Parts é exibida quando o usuário está no modo de exibição de busca.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the Web Parts zone is displayed when the user is in the browse display mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a zona de Web Parts é exibida quando o usuário está no modo de exibição de busca; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
